item.title: Arcanist's Glasses
item.fluff: These spectacles increase your sensitivity to subtle patterns of magic

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +3 item bonus to Arcana checks to detect magic.
Level 13: +5 item bonus.
Level 23: +7 item bonus.

item.title: Beryl of Catastrophe Avoidance
item.fluff: This blue gem hovers near your nead, improving your ability to speak reasonably

block.name: Properties
block.line: You gain the following benefits:
► You gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy and Insight checks.
Level 12: +3 item bonus
Level 22: +5 item bonus
► You gain a +2 bonus to Diplomacy and Insight checks against catastrophic dragons.

item.title: Casque of Tactics
item.fluff: Favored by sergeants and commanders, this utilitarian helm is remarkable only for its satin inner padding

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You and at least one ally roll initiative
Effect: You and one willing ally who you can see swap initiative results.

item.title: Circlet of Second Chances
item.fluff: Luck favors those who don this plain copper accessory

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You fail a saving throw
Effect: You reroll the triggering saving throw, using the second result even if it's lower.
Level 13: You gain a +2 power bonus to the roll.
Level 23: You gain a +4 power bonus to the roll.

item.title: Eagle Eye Goggles
item.fluff: Though these leather goggles have dark eye pieces, they sharpen your sight when making ranged attacks

item.title: Gem of Colloquy
item.fluff: This jewel hovers near your nead, sharpening your wit and expanding your knowledge of languages

block.name: Properties
block.line: You gain the following benefits:
► You gain a +1 item bonus to Bluff and Diplomacy checks.
Level 12: +3 item bonus
Level 22: +5 item bonus
► You understand and speak 1 additional language. The language is chosen when the item is created.
Level 12: 2 additional languages
Level 12: 3 additional languages

item.title: Headband of Perception
item.fluff: This chiffon headwrap is stitched with eye-shaped patters, which heighten your senses

item.title: Reading Spectacles
item.fluff: Your vision blurs the first time you put on these spectacles, then written text comes into perfect focus and clarity

block.name: Property
block.line: When this item created, the creator chooses any three languages.
You can read the chosen languages, though the spectacles do not grant the ability to speak or write languages.
Level 12: You can read any language, and gain a +4 item bonus to checks related to reading the languages chosen when this item was created.
